file_content.text: No! The rumors were true! The Sith has come for us!
No! General Gesselle's warning was true! The Sith has come for us!
Men, rally around me. The fight is upon us.
I didn't think a single assailant could make it through Castle Organa's defenses all the way here to us.
The Organa guards are well-trained. It was quite a challenge.
It was tough.
It will feel like child's play compared to facing me, Sith.
It was easy.
Consider yourself warned, Sith.
I kill everything that gets in my way!
I'm unstoppable!
Mark my words, I will stop you, Sith.
You will not harm Parvin and Gregor Willsaam. I vow it.
I disavow it.
On the contrary....
This can be peaceful, Jedi.
So, you murdered countless innocents to get here, and now you want to make friends?
Please, Master Jedi, I realize the Sith can't be trusted, but I want to hear this.
Try to stop me and you die.
I'll harm you first, then.
Please, if we really are the cause of all this death, I--I want to know why.
Fine. Say your piece, Sith. I'm not going anywhere, and I will protect them, no matter what.
Sit tight, Jedi. I'll be with you shortly.
Give me a moment.
It's going to be fun acquainting you with reality.
You're deluded.
Please, no more bloodshed. If there's something you want from us, I'm willing to listen.
I'm here to do things for them, not to them.
I don't plan on harming them.
Then there's no need for further violence. Sith, what is it you want?
Gregor, this has to do with Jaesa. I just know it.
Yes, I'm here because of your daughter.
That's right.
Give her a prize. Jaesa must get her Force sensitivity from you.
That's obvious.
Quit your prattling, woman.
Shut up.
I knew she shouldn't have gone with the Jedi! Now the Empire is hunting her!
Sith... Jaesa was our life. She was going to marry Organa nobility so that we would no longer have to be servants.
When she... left, we sacrificed that dream. We don't know anything about Jaesa now. We were told we would probably never see her again.
We are mere servants. What could you want with us?
You will be my message to Jaesa.
Not personal. [Kill Willsaams]
You... you just want us to give her a message?
No, Gregor, it's our deaths that will be a message to Jaesa.
Listen to your wife, Gregor Willsaam. Her explanation is very likely the truth.
Please, Sith, is there any way to inspire you to spare us?
Nothing springs to mind.
No. [Choke Willsaams]
I'm here to deliver you from servitude.
I want to make you rich.
You... you want to help us?
No, Gregor, the Sith is toying with us before killing us!
Heed your wife's warning, Gregor Willsaam. Sith are devious and demented.
Is that what you mean, Sith? By killing us you end our life of servitude? Can't you spare us?
If you align with the Empire, you live.
Yes. Serve the Emperor.
You'll survive the day if you become my subjects.
Surrender to me and see.
What do you mean by this? What is to happen to us if we do as you say?
You will discover your fate on Dromund Kaas.
You'll find out later.
You'll be Imperial servants instead of Organan servants.
You'll work for a new master.
I'll see to it that you live like kings.
You'll live in luxury.
Oh, you dirty, no good cretin--
Parvin! Jaesa has gone off to a life of discipline and detachment. We are unlikely to ever see her again.
The Sith is offering us a way out of this. A way to live!
Jaesa is sensitive, Gregor. She will feel our betrayal. It will fester in her. Don't you see, this Sith is banking on that.
Do you want to live or not? Don't you think she'll feel it more severely if I kill you?
Either that or you die.
Exactly.
Did you hear me say you'll live like kings?
I'm promising you wealth.
I'll make sure you live like kings.
You will want for nothing.
My wife can't see the big picture.
You offer a choice between death or pledging ourselves to our daughter's enemy.
I choose that Parvin and I live in the arms of the Empire. And I trust that my daughter will understand and remain strong.
Your wife has to agree as well.
I must hear Parvin's approval.
Good decision.
Please, my sweet, stand with me on this.
You better keep Parvin in line.
Crack the whip on your wife.
In time, she will see the rightness of this decision.
My place is with you, Gregor. As long as we're alive, there's hope.
We are in agreement. We shall embrace the Empire. Tell us what happens next.
You'll receive instructions at the Imperial landing.
Go to the spaceport.
The Empire's capital planet awaits your arrival.
You will go to Dromund Kaas.
Darth Baras will arrange your transport off this planet.
My master will decide.
Ahem. I'm so glad you've all found an accord. But there's still the matter of you being our enemy, Sith.
Not only will I not allow the Willsaams to do this, but you had yourself a killing spree getting here. That can't go unpunished.
Stand in my way and everyone dies.
Don't push me, Jedi.
This is a peaceful solution, Jedi. Honor it.
I wish harm to no one.
Yes, Master Volryder, stay true to the Jedi Code and keep the peace. Too many have died already today.
Gregor and I go of our own free will. And spare this house any further pain.
This doesn't sit right, but I can't attack someone walking in peace. Even a Sith.
You just saved your life.
Be thankful.
Deceit will catch up to you, Sith, one way or another.
This proves that the Jedi Code is folly. It makes you weak.
Pathetic.
The code is everything, Sith. But I wouldn't expect you to respect it.
Leave out the back door to avoid further casualties. I'll say nothing further.
I was hoping you'd say that. I'd rather slaughter them!
Death it is. [Choke Willsaams]
It's time for you both to die.
Your deaths. [Kill Willsaams]
No...! I've never seen a Sith kill that way so quickly. I... had no time to intervene.
My confidence and ego made me lax and led to their deaths. My failure will only be remedied by bringing you to justice.
Only your rage can defeat me. Unleash it.
Get mad, Jedi.
Yes! My shame must be eradicated!
Don't worry, your shame ends now.
You're next to die! [Attack]
May the Force give me the strength to overcome you.
I've accomplished my mission. No need for you to die, too.
Just stand down.
I can't let this stand.
Go now, Gregor and Parvin. My men will safely escort you under a diplomatic banner to the Imperial spaceport.
This better not be a deception, Sith. The Willsaams had better not be harmed.
You won't know either way, and there's nothing you can do about it.
Or what?
My word is my bond, Jedi.
I gave my word.
It's my hope that counts for something.
Leave out the back door so no more blood is spilled.
If you doubt me further, they die.
Then shut up.
General, this is our sworn enemy--why do you not resist?
Gregor, this has something to do with Jaesa, I can feel it!
I can think of nothing.
No. [Kill Willsaams]
I'm here to kill you both.
Your deaths. [Kill Willsaams]
May the Jedi protect our dear daughter!
That was a bitter pill to swallow. It was painful to see them sacrificed. But it had to be.
You've accomplished your goal, Sith. I have much to do. Please leave.
Good riddance to you.
Glad to be done with this.
You took the words right out of my mouth.
Pleasure doing business with you, General.
You've been a great help.
Business has never been so cold and hard to stomach. Goodbye.
Good luck.
I'm afraid we're a far cry from best. My conscience will need time to heal from this.
My hands are tied, Parvin. It is for the greater good.
I trust there is a shuttle from the Imperial spaceport. We will make our way there immediately.
I'll have you escorted under a diplomatic banner. You won't be harmed along the way.
If you're seeking our thanks, General, don't hold your breath. Come on, Gregor.
That was unpleasant.
So... where is she? Where's Jaesa, General?
I'm afraid your daughter is not here, Parvin, Gregor. I'm sorry I had to lie.
What do you mean? If Jaesa hasn't returned, why have you summoned us here?
I'm the reason you're here.
To meet me.
The general will throw almost anyone into the fire for her purposes.
Gesselle is ruthless.
Just tell them the truth and get it over with.
Level with them, General.
Oh my... no, a Sith! What--what's going on?
Try to remain calm. This is not pleasant, but I'm afraid I must place you at this Sith's mercy.
I... cannot... brea....
Then allow me. [Attack]
Fools. [Kill Willsaams]
